Class Board

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt2003.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class represents the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(ArrayList<Tile> gameboard, String name, String description, int rows, int cols)
      Creates a board object.
      Parameters:
      gameboard - : Arraylist of all the tiles that belongs on the board.
      name - : Name of the board.
      description - : Description for the board.
      rows - : Number of rows on the board.
      cols - : Number of columns on the board.

  • Method Details

    • getGameboard

      public ArrayList<Tile> getGameboard()
      returns the gameboard.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the tiles within the board.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      returns the name of the board.
      Returns:
      returns the board name.

    • getCols

      public int getCols()
      getter for the number of columns on the board.
      Returns:
      returns the amount of columns on the board.

    • getCoordinates

      public int[] getCoordinates(int location)
      Calculates the coordinates based on the position and a given number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the tile to get coordinates for.
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the tile as an array of integers, where the first element is the x-coordinate and the second element is the y-coordinate.

    • getCoordinatesMonopoly

      public int[] getCoordinatesMonopoly(int location)
      Calculates the coordiantes based on the location for the monopoly board.
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the tile to get coordinates for.
      Returns:
      the location based on inputed coordinates.

    • getLocation

      public int getLocation(int x, int y)
      Calculates the coordinates based on the position and a given number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      Returns:
      the location based on inputed coordinates.
